description.brazilian: Compre todas as melhorias e colete todas as recompensas (Rota A)
description.english: Buy all upgrades and collect all rewards (Route A)
description.french: Acheter toutes les améliorations et récupérer toutes les récompenses (Route A)
description.german: Kaufe alle Upgrades und sammle alle Belohnungen (Route A)
description.italian: Acquista tutti i potenziamenti e raccogli tutte le ricompense (Percorso A)
description.japanese: すべてのアップグレードを購入し、すべての報酬を収集 (ルート A)
description.koreana: 모든 업그레이드 구매 및 모든 보상 획득 (루트 A)
description.russian: Купите все улучшения и соберите все награды (Маршрут А)
description.schinese: 购买所有升级并收集所有奖励 (路线 A)
description.spanish: Compra todas las mejoras y recoge todas las recompensas (Ruta A)
description.tchinese: 購買所有升級並收集所有獎勵 (路線 A)

description.japanese: ルート B をクリア
